a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Deaths attributed to household air pollution vs. deaths attributed to
Estimated annual number of deaths attributed to household and ambient air pollution per100,000 people.
Deaths attributed to ambient air pollution
Deaths attributed to household air pollution
Data source: World Health Organization; HYDE (2023); Gapminder (2022); UN WPP (2024)
Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is age-standardized.
